game.description: Explore the ancient ruins and uncover the secrets of a long-lost civilization.
game.objective: Retrieve the fabled Sceptre of Light, said to hold the power to vanquish darkness.
game.quest_giver: High Priestess Aria, guardian of the temple's sacred knowledge.
game.reward: A magical amulet granting resistance to shadow-based attacks and a boost to intelligence stats.

tasks.description: Navigate through the treacherous jungle terrain to reach the entrance of the ancient ruins.
tasks.location: Jungle of Whispers, near the old stone bridge.
tasks.objective: Avoid deadly traps and hostile creatures while making your way through the dense foliage.

tasks.description: Solve the ancient puzzle locked mechanism to gain access to the inner sanctum.
tasks.location: Temple entrance, inside the ancient ruins.
tasks.objective: Use your wit and problem-solving skills to unlock the mysterious door.

tasks.description: Retrieve the Sceptre of Light from its pedestal, guarded by a fearsome dark entity.
tasks.location: Inner sanctum, within the heart of the ancient ruins.
tasks.objective: Defeat the dark entity and claim the sceptre before it falls into the wrong hands.

game.title: The Lost Sceptre of Light
